dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A new 216 million dollar donation from Mark Zuckerberg and his wife, through the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, to the Silicon Valley Community Foundation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A new two hundred sixteen million dollar donation from Mark Zuckerberg and his wife, through the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative, to the Silicon Valley Community Foundation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zuckerberg and his wife made their latest donation via the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative (known as CZI), their philanthropic, advocacy and impact investing entity. CZI confirmed the $214 million donation but declined to comment further.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's... uh, that's a pretty wild contrast. But the foundation itself has been going through its own stuff, hasn't it? The former CEO, Emmett Carson...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's... uh, that's a pretty wild contrast. But the foundation itself has been going through its own stuff, hasn't it? The former C E O, Emmett Carson...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he was paid nearly a million a year, oversaw huge growth in assets, but there was this investigation into unchecked harassing behavior under his watch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he was paid nearly a million a year, oversaw huge growth in assets, but there was this investigation into unchecked harassing behavior under his watch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Carson, Forbes reported, was paid nearly $1 million a year, and was proud of the fact that under his watch, the foundations assets grew from less than $1 billion to $13.5 billion. But along the way, he oversaw an organization where harassing behavior went uncheckedand often unreported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the report said many allegations were substantiated. They clearly failed to provide a safe workplace. He's gone now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the report said many allegations were substantiated. They clearly failed to provide a safe workplace. He's gone now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When the investigation was completed in June, the foundation published the summary and said in a statement that many allegations from current and former employees were substantiated and that SVCF clearly failed to provide a safe and inclusive workplace environment for its employees. The foundation boards statement also said Carson would depart his employment at SVCF, without specifying whether Carson resigned or was fired, or whether he was paid a severance or not.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the number two executive, Mari Ellen Loijens, she resigned too after similar allegations were published.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the number two executive, Mari Ellen Loijens, she resigned too after similar allegations were published.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Carsons departure came two months after the foundations former number two executive, Mari Ellen Loijens, the chief business, development and brand officer, resigned after the Chronicle of Philanthropy published an article detailing allegations of Loijens harassing behavior.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So they've got a new CEO starting in December, Nicole Taylor, coming over from the Arizona State University Foundation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they've got a new C E O starting in December, Nicole Taylor, coming over from the Arizona State University Foundation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The newly named CEO of SVCF is Nicole Taylor, who previously served as vice president of the Arizona State University Foundation, overseeing annual giving, estate and gift planning and foundation relations. She will begin her role in on December 19, according to the foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: She's got deep roots in the Bay Area nonprofit scene, which is good. She mentioned the region's contrastsâ€”innovation culture masking deep social challenges.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She's got deep roots in the Bay Area nonprofit scene, which is good. She mentioned the region's contrasts-innovation culture masking deep social challenges.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: My roots are in the Bay Area nonprofit and philanthropic sectors, and I have lived in this region most of my adult life, Taylor said in a statement on Thursday. Silicon Valley is a region of contrasts, one in which deep social challenges are often masked by the high-profile innovation culture.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting that most donations to SVCF are through those donor-advised funds. Super attractive for tax reasons, especially after a big windfall like selling company shares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting that most donations to S V C F are through those donor-advised funds. Super attractive for tax reasons, especially after a big windfall like selling company shares.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most people donate to SVCF using something called a donor-advised fund, which is like a charitable bank account that holds assets until the donor wants to disperse some or all of the money to a nonprofit. Donors can deduct as much as 30% of adjusted gross income when contributing to a donor-advised fund, so they are particularly attractive in years when theres a big tax bill after, say, selling your company or selling shares in an IPO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And Forbes found at least seventeen billionaires have donated nearly four billion to the foundation, mostly in the last five years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And Forbes found at least seventeen billionaires have donated nearly four billion to the foundation, mostly in the last five years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes documented in May that at least 16 billionaires (see here for their names) have donated at least $3.8 billion to the foundation, the majority of it in the past six years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's just such a massive flow of money, and now it's got this new leadership trying to, you know, rebuild trust and focus on that community work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just such a massive flow of money, and now it's got this new leadership trying to, you know, rebuild trust and focus on that community work.
